//Add two numbers
0: 0001 1111 LDA 15
1: 0010 1110 ADD 14
2: 1110 0000 OUT
3: 1111 0000 HLT
14: 0000 0010
15: 0000 0001

//Count by 3's
0:0101 0011 LDI 3
1:0100 1111 STA 15
2:0101 0000 LDI 0
3:0010 1111 ADD 15
4:1110 0000 OUT
5:0110 0011 JMP 3

//Double Up to 128, then restart at 1
0: 0101 0001 LDI 1
1: 1110 0000 OUT
2: 0100 1111 STA 15
3: 0010 1111 ADD 15
4: 1000 0000 JZ 0
5: 1110 0000 OUT
6: 0110 0010 JMP 2

//Fibonacci (no reset)
0: 0101 0001 LDI 1
1: 0100 1110 STA 14
2: 0010 1111 ADD 15
3: 0100 1101 STA 13
4: 0001 1110 LDA 14
5: 0100 1111 STA 15
6: 0001 1101 LDA 13
7: 1110 0000 OUT
8: 0110 0001 JMP 1
15: 0000 0001

//Fibonacci (with stop)
0: 0101 0001 LDI 1
1: 0100 1110 STA 14
2: 0010 1111 ADD 15
3: 0111 1010 JC 10
4: 0100 1101 STA 13
5: 0001 1110 LDA 14
6: 0100 1111 STA 15
7: 0001 1101 LDA 13
8: 1110 0000 OUT
9: 0110 0001 JMP 1
10: 1111 0000 HLT
15: 0000 0001

//Fibonacci (with restart)
0: 0101 0001 LDI 1
1: 0100 1110 STA 14
2: 0010 1111 ADD 15
3: 0111 1010 JC 10
4: 0100 1101 STA 13
5: 0001 1110 LDA 14
6: 0100 1111 STA 15
7: 0001 1101 LDA 13
8: 1110 0000 OUT
9: 0110 0001 JMP 1
10: 0101 0001 LDI 1
11: 0100 1111 STA 15
12: 0110 0000 JMP 0
15: 0000 0001

//Count Up and Down
0: 1110 0000 OUT
1: 0010 1111 ADD 15
2: 0111 0100 JC 4
3: 0110 0000 JMP 0
4: 0011 1111 SUB 15
5: 1110 0000 OUT
6: 1000 0000 JZ 0
7: 0110 0100 JMP 4
15: 0000 0001
